predicate.note: Frames file for 'leapfrog' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: sometimes direct
example.text: Jumping in on big deals is a high profile way [0] [*T*-1] to leapfrog the problem of not having a strong retail-banking network.
example.arg: the problem of not having a strong retail-banking network

example.name: usually prepositional
example.text: To make it to top-10 status, it would have [*-1] to leapfrog over such formidable forces as Grey Advertising, D'Arcy Masius Benton & Bowles and Omnicom's DDB Needham.
example.arg: such formidable forces as Grey Advertising, D'Arcy Masius Benton & Bowles and Omnicom's DDB Needham
